definition: to take into consideration/to attend to
to look after/to take into consideration/to attend to

sentences.english: As for anything about the post-Gaddafi situation, we have not addressed that point.
sentences.chinese: 至于卡扎菲下台后的状况，我们还无暇顾及。

sentences.english: The manager inconsiderately allowed the meeting to run well into the lunch hour.
sentences.chinese: 经理未顾及他人尌迳自让会议进行到午餐时间。

sentences.english: In spite of his face, which also allow for the kids, with him.
sentences.chinese: 不顾自己的脸面，也该顾及一下孩子们吧，随他去。

sentences.english: A good evaluation considers positive qualities of type and soundness with equal weight.
sentences.chinese: 评价马士提夫要顾及类型品质和合理的体重。

sentences.english: Mrs Zhang Qishan official business is busy, busy home often feel.
sentences.chinese: 张启山公务繁忙，经常无暇顾及家里夫人的感受。

sentences.english: This number takes into account refunds, chargebacks, and sales tax.
sentences.chinese: 这个数字顾及到退款和销售税。

sentences.english: It dues not take into account the fact that children develop at different rates.
sentences.chinese: 它党费没有顾及事实，即儿童的发展，在不同的利率。

sentences.english: It always seems like you are running here and there, often much too fast, often never noticing the truly grand things in life.
sentences.chinese: 你们总是来去匆匆，无暇顾及生命真正辉煌之所在。

sentences.english: Somehow I doubt that "overwhelming interest" is the problem.
sentences.chinese: 不知怎的，我怀疑“无暇顾及”就是问题所在。

sentences.english: We are surrounded by them every day but, people are too busy to see them.
sentences.chinese: 即使我们天天被快乐围绕，但也因为太忙而无暇顾及。

sentences.english: The sages of Greece and Rome turned aside from the awful spectacle .
sentences.chinese: 希腊和罗马的贤哲却绝不顾及这种可怖的奇观。

sentences.english: In their panic and utter dejection, the apostles had not thought about it at all.
sentences.chinese: 惊吓得魂不附体的宗徒们，根本没有顾及到那么多。

sentences.english: He showed a blithe indifference to her feelings.
sentences.chinese: 他显得毫不顾及她的感情。

sentences.english: Canada and the USA-FTC are both considering a new regulation of 10 or less.
sentences.chinese: 都顾及到新的法规要求达到或者小于10。
她们没有顾及任何障碍。

sentences.english: The two methods seem contradictory concerning the way through which the negative-energy states contribute.
sentences.chinese: 这两种方法在顾及负能态贡献上看似完全对立。

definition: solely preoccupied (with one thing)/engrossed/focusing (on sth)/to look after only one aspect
to care about/equivalent of 在於|在于[zai4 yu2]
to bother about/to haggle/to bicker/to argue/plan/stratagem
to give thought (to others)/to consider (other people's needs)/also pr. [zhao2 xiang3]
to understand/to pay attention to/to take notice of
to care about/to take seriously/to take to heart
to look after/to take into consideration/to attend to
